alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Crawford; Huron; Richland; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 11:41PM EDT until August 25 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Richland County in north central Ohio... Central Huron County in north central Ohio... Ashland County in north central Ohio... Northeastern Crawford County in north central Ohio... Northwestern Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1140 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Northern Milan to near Green Springs, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Wooster, Ashland, Shelby, Rittman, Willard, Ontario, Lexington, Crestline, Loudonville, New London, Creston, Bellville, Plymouth, West Salem, Wakeman, New Washington, Hayesville, Savannah and Polk. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
